attributes.action: Help existing but displaced Health Workers get new Sponsorship without stress
attributes.additional_details: Because these healthcare professionals are more productive to offer best of services to the vulnerable people when they are rest assured of settling in with no fears of being served a 60-day curtailment period by the Home Office without a guarantee of getting a new sponsorship
attributes.background: To simply help stop suspected hoarders of COS from asking displaced health workers to part with their hard-earned resources before getting sponsored

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
